Detailed Description

Class PatchEdgeDataOpsInteger provides a collection of operations that may be used to manipulate integer edge-centered patch data. The operations include basic arithmetic, min, max, etc. With the assertion of a few basic routines, this class inherits its interface (and thus its functionality) from the base class PatchEdgeDataBasicOps from which it is derived.

A more extensive set of operations is implemented for real (double and float) and complex patch data in the classes PatchEdgeDataOpsReal and PatchEdgeDataOpsComplex, repsectively.

See also:
PatchEdgeDataBasicOps

int SAMRAI::math::PatchEdgeDataOpsInteger::numberOfEntries ( const boost::shared_ptr< pdat::EdgeData< int > > &  data,
const hier::Box &  box 
) const

Return the number of data values for the edge-centered data object in the given box. Note that it is assumed that the box refers to the cell-centered index space corresponding to the patch hierarchy.

Precondition:
data
data->getDim() == box.getDim()

void SAMRAI::math::PatchEdgeDataOpsInteger::swapData ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::Patch > &  patch,
const int  data1_id,
const int  data2_id 
) const

Swap pointers for patch data objects. Objects are checked for consistency of depth, box, and ghost box.

Precondition:
patch
patch->getPatchData(data1_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::EdgeData<int> >
patch->getPatchData(data2_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::EdgeData<int> >
patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getDepth() == patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getDepth()
patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getBox())
patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getGhostBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getGhostBox())

References BOOST_CAST, and TBOX_ASSERT.

Referenced by SAMRAI::math::HierarchyEdgeDataOpsInteger::swapData().
